```py
pdf = FPDF(orientation = 'P', unit = 'mm', format = 'A4')
pdf.add_page()
pdf.set_font('helvetica', 'bold', 10)
pdf.set_text_color(255, 255, 255)
```

```py
pdf.set_xy(x, y)
pdf.cell(w, h, txt, border, align, fill)
```
